rules_text:
Flying
When Larissi, Wonder Weaver enters, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{1}, Sacrifice Larissi, Wonder Weaver: Copy target spell you control that was cast from a graveyard or that had {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} spent to cast it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
